review: Easy to install and setup, (update took 10 minutes right off the bat) For amazon prime content the loading is fast to non existent (our internet is 60mb down 4mp up)Our Kindle Fire HD has Disney apps ESPN apps and even our cable company app which all work great. The Fire stick has the same APPS BUT we cannot choose our cable provider (CHARTER) to access them, not , listed (Coming soon).The Fire Stick Remote control application for phones and tablets is not available on AMAZONS OWN KINDLE FIRE HD. (Or my windows 8 phone)Our Roku still beats any streaming device out there I can do all of the above (even amazon prime) on our roku.Couldn't pass up the $20 price, unless they improve access for my cable company soon! then it was a poor purchase even at $20
